cyclone.name: CRISTOBAL
cyclone.current_location: about 50 miles WSW of Campeche, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: Expected to meander over the southern Bay of Campeche through mid-week, then begin a generally northward trek across the Gulf later in the 5-day period.
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: southern Bay of Campeche coast (near Campeche/Veracruz, MX)
